name: SelectedOption
title: Selected Option
description: A very simple plugin that allows you to specify and select a default option in a select input based on a data_selectedOption attribute. By Default will select all 'Select' Input elements on page. Can be called to just select by id, class or any selector.

A very simple plugin that allows you to specify and select a default option in a select input based on a data-selectedOption attribute.  

By Default will select all 'Select' Input elements on page.

<Select id=Select1 data-SelectedOption="3">
<option value=1> One
<option value=2> Two
<option value=3> Three
 

</Select>

$.SelectedOption();
